website_summaries.verdict: A simple stool that's a great height for preschoolers to reach the toilet and sink.
pros: Easy to wash. Good for small bathrooms
Anti-slip top and grips at the bottom of the stool help prevent children from slipping and falling
Holes in side make it easy for child to grip
cons: A little short for toddlers to reach the toilet, but they will grow into it, and can use it at the sink at their current height

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful! Excellent price, too!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful! This step stool is light-weight, but very sturdy. It is small enough to fit in our tiny bathroom and wide/strong enough for kids to use as a step for potty training and washing hands. Great price, too! I highly recommend this stool! Please mark if you find my review helpful. Thank you so much!
customer_reviews.author: PeggyTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Good for small bathroom
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect size for a small bathroom. My six year old daughter uses this and she is 43 inches tall. It is the perfect height for her to reach the bathroom sink to wash her hands and brush her teeth. My bathroom is very small and this doesn't take a lot of space.
customer_reviews.author: KimTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: *This is super likely with my toddler because she carries it around ...
customer_reviews.text: I think this stool is a little too short for my toddle and the underside has all these little plastic snaps that are really pokey and somewhat sharp. So, if your toddler flips it over and somehow steps on that, it would be disasterous. *This is super likely with my toddler because she carries it around and isnt the most coordinated child*
customer_reviews.author: T M.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for my 3 year old. Its very light weight so she can carry it arround to where she needs it. The color is a vibrant pink. Its easy to clean. The only thing to be cautious about is the height. Its a short stool. So you have to take in consideration the height of your toilet and sink. My sink is rather tall but she can still reach the knobs if she tip toes. My daughter is tall cor her age so again be cautious and measure just to make sure this is the right height for your child.
customer_reviews.author: Esther Flores

customer_reviews.title: Good simple step stool
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I didn’t like about this is I expected the top of it (pink part) to be rubberized non slip material but it’s not it’s just plastic with slight non slip feel. Not as strong of a non slip as other stools.
customer_reviews.author: Lyss

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter says this stool is a keeper
customer_reviews.text: Our 2.5 yo granddaughter likes this pink stool. She wanted to take it from our house to her house. That is her greatest compliment, when she asks to keep something that she likes. We use this low-rise stool in our main-floor bath for her to wash her hands. That bath has a 30" sink rather than the higher counters found in kitchens and bedrooms. This pink stool is adequate for her. We have an old 2-step stool, but that seemed too high for her to be climbing in a hard-surface bathroom .
customer_reviews.author: dclaudew

customer_reviews.title: Purchased Two!
customer_reviews.text: These little stools are perfect! I purchased one of each color for my kids. They are stackable for easy storage and light weight. The kids can easily move them around, as necessary. There are holes on the sides, which I use to carry them around. The top is a smooth rubber material while the bottom is plastic and the entire stool wipes clean easily. I've stood on it and did not feel like it was going to crack or break. Would absolutely purchase additional stools, if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy R.

customer_reviews.title: Not for potty training
customer_reviews.text: I’m astonished by all of the positive reviews; perhaps it’s a “well it was cheap so it’s better than anticipated” positive reviews. This stool is cheaply made, thin, flimsy, incredible small, and has zero grip on the bottom. It slides all over tile floor. Sent this back.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly W

customer_reviews.title: Light enough for 1-year-old to drag around
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy. Lightweight. Child sized. I purchased this so my granddaughter could sit at our coffee table. She usually stands beside the table using it to eat her snack of string cheese threads and Teddy Grahams. I thought she should be able to sit if wanted. However, she rarely sits. She does drag the stool around as it is so light. It gets used to give her a boost onto the couch. (She’s a climber.) I can see it being a good booster for potty use eventually. It was a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: SAM

customer_reviews.title: Vibrant color, solid construction, wish it were taller!
customer_reviews.text: I love the bright pink color of this stool (ordered for my daughter, whose favorite color is pink). It is light enough for a young child to carry around, but feels sturdy. I wish the stool were a little taller - even for my 4 year old, it is a little bit of a stretch to reach the faucets/see in the vanity mirror in her bathroom...but most stools of this size/style aren't sufficient for that, so it's my own fault for not a taller ordering a 2-step model. Potential buyers might want to measure how tall of a stool they really need before ordering.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea B.

customer_reviews.title: Great stool at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: My neice loves it!! Lightweight and easy for her to carry and move around. Amazing, vibrant color choices. Well made and a thick, durable plastic. I also like the bubbled texture of the top of this stool which provides more traction for kids to stand on. We've had this awesome stool for 3+ years now and it still looks brand new after years of 2 kiddos lugging it around. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Ehimmelman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my 2
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my 2.5 year old daughter to reach the potty and the sink! She also sometimes carries it into the kitchen to help me make dinner 😂 It's literally the perfect height for her. She's a bit tall for her age but even if she were shorter I could see it still working for her. And it's extremely light so it's easy for her or i to pick it up and move it wherever it needs to be:)
customer_reviews.author: P. Graham

customer_reviews.title: Use for Just a Little Boost
customer_reviews.text: This is about 5-6 inches off the ground. If your little one is exactly that, little, and still learning to use the sink area, this probably is a bit small. If your child is used to stools, a little older, and just needs a boost onto the toilet or sink area, this will work great!
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Mathine

customer_reviews.title: My toddler’s favorite gift!
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift for my daughter’s second birthday and knew it would be a HIT with her! She had been trying to carry around a folding stool but it always made me too nervous that she was going to smash her little fingers in it. So I got her this and she LOVES it. It’s easy for her to carry around and sturdy enough for me to not worry about her being on it. It’s a great little stool!
customer_reviews.author: DHeinrichs

customer_reviews.title: So helpful and my daughter loves it!!
customer_reviews.text: Not only does it help my daughter get up on the potty, it's made it fun which seems to encourage her to want to try. She also likes to push it over to the sink now to wash her hands right after! This little stool is stable, lightweight and has rubber pads underneath to prevent slippage. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Rolling Home RV Rentals

customer_reviews.title: Oops
customer_reviews.text: Small and compact. Slid out from under the child using it. Near an accedent. Could stand to be a little more strudy and grip floor better. It was near the soafa and my small dog climbed on i t to get on sofa... dog fell. Sorry i cant recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Debra MAC

customer_reviews.title: The top is plastic and very slippery and when u flip it over the i side is dangerous and has sharp plastic nubs sticking out i really thought it would of been a non slip rubber so very disappointed and my child cut her the edge of her ...
customer_reviews.text: Where do i begin. Its shorter then my other 3 i have in our house. The top is plastic and very slippery and when u flip it over the i side is dangerous and has sharp plastic nubs sticking out i really thought it would of been a non slip rubber so very disappointed and my child cut her the edge of her hand on inside because the plastic is sharp and not covered. Horrible product. Got w bamoo i love that one.
customer_reviews.author: RONDA

customer_reviews.title: So perfect for little kids.
customer_reviews.text: We looked for quite awhile for a little stool. This is the perfect size and is really cute. I keep it in the bathroom so my little girl can wash her hands by herself. It's nice because it can fit right under the sink in the cupboards if needed too. It's not too bulky or big.
customer_reviews.author: AnneMarie

customer_reviews.title: Great for small bathrooms
customer_reviews.text: A little smaller than I imagined but good enough for my soon to be two year old. It's small enough to not take up the entire front of your counter. She can just now reach the sink with her chin and can reach to put her tooth brush under the water. I still have to give her a boost to wash her hands but she will grow into it.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Altman

customer_reviews.title: amazing stool !
customer_reviews.text: The stool is very sturdy and is perfect for any kid that can stand. It is light so you can carry the stool from one place to another! The picture is true to color. All and all a great product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: AS

customer_reviews.title: Would purchase another if needed.
customer_reviews.text: My grandchild loves her little stepping stool and takes it where ever she needs assistance. She’s independent and loves being able to do it on her own when she’s getting on the couch or her favorite chair.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Great stool
customer_reviews.text: Great cover! I was in the process of potty training my 2 year old daughter but could not get her to use the toilet as she was used to using the training toilet. So I got this to make it easier and she loves using the toilet now
customer_reviews.author: Thanh

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous
customer_reviews.text: My two year old is a very stable climber and she stepped up on this stool to have it slide out from underneath her and she cracked her two front teeth. It only took a second. Dont buy this
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Matching set, super cute, bought separately
customer_reviews.text: This is a sturdy stool for me to sit on and for my child to step on to go use the potty. I bought the matching toilet seat and I love it! LOL she can't even walk completely on her own yet... but why not get a head start. Wanted to expose her to the seat and stool and when she's ready, she can use it!
customer_reviews.author: JLO

customer_reviews.title: Wish the stools had rubber pads on the bottom to ...
customer_reviews.text: Wish the stools had rubber pads on the bottom to keep the stool in place on hardwood floors. I had to send them back.
customer_reviews.author: Shauna M.

customer_reviews.title: too short
customer_reviews.text: I thought it was taller. Its so little my grandaughter still cannot reach the sink to brush her teeth which is why i purchased it. I should have paid more attention to the description.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Great stool for toddlers
customer_reviews.text: My 19 month old is tall. She gets this stool out from under the sink and puts it back. She can't reach the soap or water but this stool puts her hands above the sink so it is easier to wash them for her. I love it! And she does too.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Sibley

customer_reviews.title: Not talk enough
customer_reviews.text: This still isnt tall enough for our toilets. Maybe the old small cheap round ones. If you have the comfort height, it isnt tall enough. It is very lightweight and daughter liked color.
customer_reviews.author: j rez

customer_reviews.title: A Step in Pink
customer_reviews.text: I use this under my desk at the office as it's just the right height for raising my feet to coincide with the chair ergonomic level so it works with my keyboard and monitor. It is light weight, pretty pink color on the top, and easy to move around. I imagine a child standing on it would have no issues. Certainly as an adult, not sure that would be sturdy enough. This item works for my intended purpose, and can recommend it accordingly.
customer_reviews.author: L. K. Epstein

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy yet lightweight
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is almost 2 years old. She loves this thing. It is sturdy enough to take her constant abuse yet lightweight enough for her to carry around with ease. My only issue with it is that it should have something around the bottom edge to keep it from sliding so easy.
customer_reviews.author: J. Frank

customer_reviews.title: Great stool for toddler
customer_reviews.text: We have this in pur bathroom so our 2 year old can wash her hands. Works great and she often goes and gets it to reach stuff in other areas of the house (both good and bad!)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I tend to sit on this in front of my child while she is trying to go and I feel like my big butt is going to break through it
customer_reviews.text: It's OK, not as strong as I'd hoped. I tend to sit on this in front of my child while she is trying to go and I feel like my big butt is going to break through it. Fine for the intended use; a toddler :)
customer_reviews.author: GR

customer_reviews.title: Great for mischievous youngins
customer_reviews.text: Awesome little stool. Do your rugrats have trouble climbing onto everything in the house? buy one of these to hep them climb the countertops, kitchen table, fireplace, tv stand, toilet, beds, etc... They will love to torment you with their new ease of reaching areas they shouldn't be in.
customer_reviews.author: Ajm

customer_reviews.title: Slippery!
customer_reviews.text: The stool is not skid-proof on the bottom or the top. Therefore, it is not at all safe or useful for small children. Most stools of this type have non-skid plastic pads on the bottom and nubbies on the top.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth R. Duckett

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: What can I say? She can move it easily and its a good size and is sturdy for her to reach the potty, light switches, or the sink.
customer_reviews.author: The Warden Family

customer_reviews.title: Better for bigger kids
customer_reviews.text: Be mindful of tiled/hard floors. It doesnt have rubber on the bottom slides on floor a little too easy even when directly placed in front of something sturdy. This would be better for bigger kids with more surer of there footing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: We love our new step stool. My daughter is so excited to brush her teeth and use the sink now that she can stand tall and see the mirror. Good quality and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Armenta

customer_reviews.title: well
customer_reviews.text: we bought it for potty training but it was better used as an all purpose step for my kiddo. she just liked using it everywhere except the bathroom. LOL
customer_reviews.author: RPWARD89

customer_reviews.title: Great size
customer_reviews.text: A good size to not be in an adults way, yet easily accessable by a toddler. Tall enough to get them up on a high toilet.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Samson

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this stool for my 3 year old niece to use in the bathroom to help her reach the sink and such. I was really pleased with how sturdy it feels. It was smaller than I expected but it is still big enough. It is slip proof on the top and the bottom. The holes in the sides make it easy for her to move it around to where she wants it. The design is very cute and she loves that it is pink and white.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn M. Schemenauer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy enough for my 3-year old and 7-year old and light enough for them to move it from the toilet to the sink easily.
customer_reviews.author: Natalia C.

customer_reviews.title: Great little step stool for toddlers
customer_reviews.text: Bought one for my 3 year old granddaughter. Helps her reach the bathroom sink. Light and easy for her to move around. Affordable price too!
customer_reviews.author: Pearly

customer_reviews.title: Boosting toddler independence
customer_reviews.text: Needed replacement stool and decided to buy two. So glad I did these are sturdy and will keep my toddler from running back and forth with her stools to make sure she can reach everything! She loves her independence so keeping this near the bathroom sink helps her be able to reach to turn water off and on.
customer_reviews.author: Faithful Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: Just received the stool for my daughter and it's alot smaller than I thought it'd be. She's approximately 37 inches tall and it's not tall enough for her to reach the faucet in the bathroom. Double check measurements, it was something I didn't look at. I wouldn't purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Momma of 4

customer_reviews.title: A 3 year olds “go to”
customer_reviews.text: My three year old has used this for months. She uses it to get in bed, as a boost to brush her teeth, help her get on the “big girl potty”. Definitely recommend this for any toddler.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Rice

customer_reviews.title: Returned it
customer_reviews.text: I ended up returning it. Nothing wrong with it, it just wasn't the right height for our kids and our counters.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not great for a toddler
customer_reviews.text: This may be for an older child. My daughter is 2 and likes to get on the toilet herself. The step is a little too short and it moves easily.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Gets the Job Done
customer_reviews.text: The stool fits perfectly around the base of the toilet and is the right height for our daughter to easily get on and off the toilet. The step stool provides stability when she climbs on and off the toilet . . . and she loves the pink color.
customer_reviews.author: Greg and Diane!

customer_reviews.title: White plastic with pink top, just like the picture shows. I like it!
customer_reviews.text: I use it for nursing, for my toddler to stand or sit on. It's white plastic with bright pink, just like the picture shows it. I wouldn't say it's a decorative piece for your livingroom, It would look best in the bathroom. I use it everywhere in the house! My toddler likes to sit on, play on it, and it is sturdy enough to handle it. I am happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Sweet Pea :-)

customer_reviews.title: Very good little step
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our grand daughter for her potty. The little step is light, and sturdy enough to do the job. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Kim

customer_reviews.title: Very useful
customer_reviews.text: My 2 almost 3 yr old lives this step stool to help her go potty. She even takes it around the house to get that little bit more height whatever she’s doing. I use it myself on occasion and love the stability it has.
customer_reviews.author: Chase Hutchings

customer_reviews.title: Very small and tiny
customer_reviews.text: Very tiny stool. I got it so my puppy could look out the window. It’s so little it doesn’t give any height
customer_reviews.author: sin.......s

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: This foot step is so light and perfect for my 4 YO daughter. She loves pink too so it's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Enedina Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Stool for my toddler
customer_reviews.text: I bought this little stool for my toddler to be able to reach the toilet and the sink. It is good quality and does its job. I would recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great little stool for young girl/boy
customer_reviews.text: stepdaughter loves it great for reaching the sink when brushing teeth/washing hands
customer_reviews.author: Bill Artinger

customer_reviews.title: Great with kids around
customer_reviews.text: Needed this for our church bathroom. Easy for kids to use and sturdy as described.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Good step stool
customer_reviews.text: Works great for my granddaughter, very sturdy but yet small enough to put away.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Well made. Sturdy. Nice materials. Priced right. We bought two and were quite pleased.
customer_reviews.author: TobycW

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves that she can move this around herself and it puts her at just the right height for the sink and dresser or anything else she needs.
customer_reviews.author: Starr

customer_reviews.title: Great stool
customer_reviews.text: Great little potty training stool to get up to the big potty. Cute bright pink
customer_reviews.author: Amanda B.

customer_reviews.title: Great step stool for toddlers and young kids.
customer_reviews.text: Three year old daughter loves it. It does what it's supposed to do and stays put while she's on it. No slips at all. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, it’s the perfect height for my 2 year old to climb up to the toilet or into and out of the bath without slipping
customer_reviews.author: Houston Earnest

customer_reviews.title: Colors are great and a good height
customer_reviews.text: Decent product. A little slippery at times as there are no grippers at the bottom. We have hardwood floors so it tends to slide. My 2 year old has used it for months at her play kitchen. Colors are great and a good height.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Just right
customer_reviews.text: Very light weight (easy for 2 year old to carry and move), good width.
customer_reviews.author: tinydancer

customer_reviews.title: Short!
customer_reviews.text: It’s too short if u want ur child to reach the sink. My daughter is 3 1/2 and still can’t reach the sink. It does help with potty though.
customer_reviews.author: Jessicat32

customer_reviews.title: Good material and stable enough
customer_reviews.text: This is cute, I just wish it was a bit taller, I got it so my almost 2 year old could teach the sink to wash hands and brush teeth but she is still too short for that I will have to wait a little longer. But it's a good product, stable and well made, we will wait a bit so my daughter grows a few inches to put it to use but I do recommend the product and will give it full stars
customer_reviews.author: Ana Santos Cuponeira

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy step stool
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy step stool that I use so my daughter can reach the sink. Ordered two for different bathrooms. Simple but exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: DrewSP

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: My daughter uses this to get on to the toilet, great and sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Gmorales

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My daughter love this she ise it to wash her hand on the sink
customer_reviews.author: Rafael J Cabral

customer_reviews.title: My granddaughter loves it!
customer_reviews.text: When my granddaughter opened the box she was thrilled that now she had her own step stool. She carried it around with her all day, using it to help her reach things she could not reach before; sometimes a detriment. She can now reach the bathroom faucet and wash her hands by herself; something she is very proud that she can now do.
customer_reviews.author: John J. Dervin

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: We bought 2 of these for potty training they work best with lower set toilets.They are sturdy and pretty easy for our daughter to move around by herself. Good product.
customer_reviews.author: DannieB

customer_reviews.title: Must buy
customer_reviews.text: Daughter uses it everyday and loves it. Made her excited to brush her teeth.
customer_reviews.author: Ola

customer_reviews.title: Very cute and a great price
customer_reviews.text: Great stool for my little one. She can now reach the sink to wash her hands and brush her teeth.
customer_reviews.author: lee

customer_reviews.title: Too short.
customer_reviews.text: Too short. Needs to be at least 2 inches taller to help kids reach sink and so their feet are supported while sitting. The only thing I do like is the traction is quite good so this does not slip back and forth.
customer_reviews.author: Lisette Doyle

customer_reviews.title: Helps my little granddaughter use the sink and potty
customer_reviews.text: Works good for her, but wish it was a tiny bit taller.
customer_reviews.author: Hp5946

customer_reviews.title: lightweight but sturdy. my 2 year old carries it around to ...
customer_reviews.text: this is exactly as pictured. small, lightweight but sturdy. my 2 year old carries it around to where she needs it. it has a non slip base.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: as it tends to slide very easily on our hardwood floors
customer_reviews.text: My little girl loves this step stool. Wish the grip pads on the bottom were slightly larger, as it tends to slide very easily on our hardwood floors. Otherwise sturdy and useful.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Perfect kid’s stool
customer_reviews.text: Non-slip. Great height for 3 to daughter. Loves the pink! Multiple uses. Easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: C.C.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for busy toddler
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my daughter's favorite possessions right now. She takes it everywhere and uses it all the time. It's nice and small so it's easy for her to use as she pleases and meets all of our needs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... she can brush her teeth and wash her hands like a big girl
customer_reviews.text: My 2 yr old granddaughter loves it so she can brush her teeth and wash her hands like a big girl.
customer_reviews.author: jakeegirl

customer_reviews.title: Hurt my 2 year old
customer_reviews.text: It broke when my 2 year old (40lbs) was standing on it. Cut her leg all up.
customer_reviews.author: S. King

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: She uses this stool for brushing her teeth. It is perfect height for her to reach the sink.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Dickinson

customer_reviews.title: This product is good if you have a runner to go under it ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is good if you have a runner to go under it to avoid it from moving around when the kids step on it. Unfortunately the step moves when my kids get on it and it moves quite a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Ana Giraldo

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with the product...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 3-year-old to be able to reach the sink and brush her teeth. I was disappointed in how little height this product added, she ended up still having to stand on her tippy toes, which defeated the purpose of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my 4 year old to use in the bathroom while brushing her teeth...great for the price
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay1881

customer_reviews.title: this is very poorly made the plastic is super cheap. for now it will do for my ...
customer_reviews.text: this is very poorly made the plastic is super cheap. for now it will do for my 5 year old , but will not be keeping. made for a weight of a 2-3 year old child. therefore doesnt feel to safe or that it will hold her too much longer.
customer_reviews.author: Ulises A. Vargas

customer_reviews.title: Working good
customer_reviews.text: It's being used, its liked, and it was a good gift
customer_reviews.author: TM

customer_reviews.title: Loved this step-stool for my toddler
customer_reviews.text: Love this little step stool. It's about 6 inches tall and the curvature on the one side allows it to fit up against the base of a toilet. It wasn't tall enoug for my two year old to stand on a get on my toilet but my toilet sits up high. I think this would be best for 3 year old and up.
customer_reviews.author: ChristinaAmazon1905

customer_reviews.title: Step stool
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this step stool for my toddler grandchild to help her to get in her new bed. She loves the pink color . It fits securely under the bed when not in use. Good buy.
customer_reviews.author: M. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Able to carry around
customer_reviews.text: Has side holes to move or carry anywhere around the house .
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Guerrero

customer_reviews.title: Step stool
customer_reviews.text: It looks a little flimsy or like it would crack easy. But it's very durable. Quality product.
customer_reviews.author: maureen fuentes

customer_reviews.title: Easy
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my 3 year old to use the potty, she can't quite reach our sinks yet but this height of stool feels safe.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, great size, and color is perfect for daughter
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a step for our daughter to be able to use when going to the restroom oand washing her hands. This has been very helpful and is used daily. No complaints about it.
customer_reviews.author: Scotty/Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Just as pictured
customer_reviews.text: Could be a little more slip resistant but very excited to use and my daughter loves it
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: It is perfect however for my daughter (2 yrs
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I expected and ordered. I was hoping it would be a little taller to help with reaching the sink but it wasn't. It is perfect however for my daughter (2 yrs.) to use to get on the potty. The color is very vibrant and the handles make it easy for her to carry it.
customer_reviews.author: Lacey

customer_reviews.title: Perfect step stool
customer_reviews.text: It’s perfect for the bathroom for my toddler to use when she’s brushing her teeth. No assembly required and it’s not heavy at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect buy
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my granddaughter to use in the bathroom to brush her teeth and go potty.

customer_reviews.title: like climbing on kitchen cabinet looking for candy
customer_reviews.text: Got this so daughter can use it as help to brush her teeth etc but she got smarter and started doing things she is it supposed to, like climbing on kitchen cabinet looking for candy. It's in the storage now
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good stool
customer_reviews.text: Nice little stool; scoots a little sometimes, but otherwise, strong and stable.
customer_reviews.author: Emmie

customer_reviews.title: These are sturdy light weight stools and my toddler enjoys carrying them ...
customer_reviews.text: These are sturdy light weight stools and my toddler enjoys carrying them around the house as much as she does actually standing on them to see in the mirror and reach the sink. I only wish the non-skid stuff on the corners worked a bit better on our laminate floors.
customer_reviews.author: Jen In VB

product_meta.title: Kids Best Friend Girls Pink Step Stool, Ideal Gift, Take It Along in Bedroom, Kitchen, Bathroom and Living Room. Great for Potty Training
product_meta.description: This "Kids Best Friend Take It Along Girls Pink Stool" is perfct for kids and toddlers of all ages. It can and will support even older kids! It is perfect for what you need it, will serve your kids in reaching high places including a sink to wash his or her hands or to brushing teeth and especially for potty training. With the easy to wash off material it is made of and the non skid rubbers protecting it from all sides will allow it to become wet and still not slip or slide. These stools stack very nicely one on top of each other, so go ahead and buy this along with one of our other colors like Blue,Green and Purple and it will serve the whole family at once and when they are done you just stack them nicely and they store beautifully.
feature_bullets: Perfect Stool for potty training, for use in bedroom, bathroom, kitchen and living room
Sturdy, comfortable and safe stool for children all ages
Anti-Slip top will prevent your child from slipping and falling
Anti-Slip grips at the bottom of the stool will keep it sturdy, preventing slipping
Will support your toddler as well, has a max load of over 70 LBS, With a height of just over 5 inches it will work perfectly for potty training your 2 year old
